sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import PayPalButton from './PayPalButton'; function CartTotals({value}){ const {cartSubTotal, cartTax, cartTotal, clearCart} = value; return(
subtotal: $ {cartSubTotal}
tax: $ {cartTax}
total: $ {cartTotal}
); } export default CartTotals;
